website_summaries.verdict: Ceramic stoneware shells molded from real oysters to cook and serve oysters and other seafood items.
pros: Safe, ceramic stoneware oyster cooking vessels are designed specifically to withstand oven heat and direct flame
Use on any type of grill or in oven using already-shucked oysters or any other type of shellfish, e.g
Add seasoning or sauce, each shell holds about 1/4 to 1/2 cup
Easy to clean with light scrub, followed by regular dishwasher cycle
cons: Breakable, so must handle with care

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking and functional!  love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I got 2 sets so I can have 24. I cook and entertain a lot. I like making fancy appetizers too. I've always wanted to make oyster rockefellars more often but hard to unless I have fresh oysters in shells. Plus they are hard to shuck if you need to feed many people. These were answers to my dilemma! They clean up well and look great! Many people couldn't even tell they weren't real shells. Thank god some asked if they should just throw them away when they got done eating it. Otherwise they would have ended up in my trash!! Expensive but highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PlanetJanet

customer_reviews.title: Loftin Ceramic Oyster Shells
customer_reviews.text: We tried these when my in laws came to town awhile back. I had actually told my wife a few months back how great it would be if someone would come up with a product like these! These look just like the real thing!!! They work not only will in the oven and under a broiler but, work well on the grill too! I used to have to shuck my own oysters for events like this. Now I can just buy them already shucked and put them into these shells for doing them raw on the half Shell or under the broiler with whatever you might want to top them with!!! These are really great!
customer_reviews.author: A Grable

customer_reviews.title: These really work and really look the part!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about spending so much money, but when I got the shells, I was very impressed. They had a little heft to them and pretty much looked like large oyster shells. I put them on a sheet pan with a delicious Oyster Rockafellas recipe and they sat perfectly flat for cooking in the oven. I served them on a bed of rock salt. It was a beautiful presentation. I tosed the empty shells in hot, and slightly-soapy water and they cleaned up beautifully. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: w;

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Great on the grill
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Great on the grill. I now have 2 dozen and am thinking of a 3rd. Clean up perfectly if you simply soak them overnight in water with a bit of baking soda. If you love oysters, these shells are a MUST!

customer_reviews.title: One arrived broken, only have 11 useable. But those 11 are fabulous
customer_reviews.text: These items arrived in a burlap sack and padded with thick straw to prevent damage. However, In spite of the good packaging one of mine arrived broken, leaving me with only 11 usable shells. That is the only reason for the 3 stars. They work great and I used them for grilling oysters and some large scallops. Worked beautifully and I was awarded with professional like results. Cleaning was not as easy as some reviews stated, but they are ceramic and it was expected on my part. How does one get in touch with the seller? I would like to have a replacement sent to me for the broken one.

customer_reviews.title: Shells are as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shells are ceramic, I've put them on the grill already, they took the flames fine and provided a good vessel to roast the oysters. Clean up after was pretty easy as expected. I'm satisfied. The only thing I would critique is they were a little more deep than I would have preferred although if you are trying to stuff them with alot of food they are good for that. They also mimic a real oyster shell as much as I'd like. All that said, they serve the purpose I wanted them for very well and I'm satisfied.

product_meta.title: Loftin Oysters Ceramic Reusable Chargrilling Oyster Shell, Set of 12. Great for Seafood of all Kinds. Made in the USA.
product_meta.description:
Chargrill oysters with your favorite receipes in this set of 12 oyster shells from Loftin Oysters. Artistically made from ceramic stoneware, these oyster shells are designed to resemble real oyster shells. Molded and finished by hand, each shell is unique so size and shape may vary. These re-usable shells are perfect for chargrilling oysters, but you can also bake, broil, stuff, and smoke with them to your heart’s desire. Cut the prep and cook time in half and enjoy more time at the table with family and friends. The shells are highly heat resistant and can be used in the oven, broiler, and can even withstand contact with flames for a period of time. The shells are proudly made in the USA and are dishwasher safe for easy clean up.

Holds 1/4 cup of liquid or 1/2 cup of stuffing; 4" L x 3" W x 1" H (each shell is different, size may vary)
feature_bullets: CERAMIC STONEWARE. Ceramic shells are safe and easy to cook with because the organic clay compounds are designed specifically to withstand high oven temperatures and direct flame

MULTIPLE COOKING OPTIONS. Great for both gas and charcoal grills. Also, great for ovens. Bake, broil, stuff and smoke to your heart’s desire. Use already shucked oysters OR OTHER SEAFOOD you want chargrilled. Think buttery, chargrilled shrimp, scallops and clams! And add your favorite seasonings. Perfect for entertaining and individual sized serving

EACH SHELL IS UNIQUE. They are molded from real oyster shells, thus the shape and size vary. On average, each shell can hold around 1/4 c liquid (such as a sauce) or 1/2 c in topping or stuffing ingredients, such as a bread crumb mixture

EASY TO CLEAN. Clean with a green scrub pad and hot water to remove food buildup and place in the dishwasher on your normal cycle. With proper care your oyster set should last as long as your regular plate ware
USE WITH OUR Loftin Oysters Grilling Tong. Can be used with our ceramic oysters or with real oysters
